Dependency=Usage Level: # Description: Hot water fixture usage and flow levels.
# Source: Field data from a demand management program with 1700 residential electric resistance water heaters in the Northeast U.S., mean-shifted from 0.8 to 1 average usage.
# Assumption: Low, Medium, and High usage is assigned based on the lower 25th percent, middle 50th percent, and upper 25th percent.
